name: TimelineItem
description: A timeline item to render as part of a timeline list

props.name: renderContent
props.description: Custom content to render right to the timeline indicator

props.name: renderHeader
props.description: Custom content to render on top of the content

props.name: indicationAlignment
props.description: Whether to align the timeline point indication at the top or the center (top alignment allowed only when passing 'renderTitle'
